The last-updated-datetime of the activity must not be in the future.
Test (Xpath): @last-updated-datetime and @last-updated-datetime castable as xs:dateTime and xs:dateTime(@last-updated-datetime) gt $now

Message: The planned start date must be before the planned end date.
Test (Xpath): activity-date[@type='1']/@iso-date and activity-date[@type='1']/@iso-date castable as xs:date and activity-date[@type='3']/@iso-date and activity-date[@type='3']/@iso-date castable as xs:date and xs:date(activity-date[@type='1']/@iso-date) gt xs:date(activity-date[@type='3']/@iso-date)

Message: The actual start date must be before the actual end date.
Test (Xpath): activity-date[@type='2']/@iso-date and activity-date[@type='2']/@iso-date castable as xs:date and activity-date[@type='4']/@iso-date and activity-date[@type='4']/@iso-date castable as xs:date and xs:date(activity-date[@type='2']/@iso-date) gt xs:date(activity-date[@type='4']/@iso-date)

Message: The actual start date of the activity must not be in the future.
Test (Xpath): activity-date[@type='2']/@iso-date and activity-date[@type='2']/@iso-date castable as xs:date and xs:date(activity-date[@type='2']/@iso-date) gt xs:date($now)

Message: The actual end date of the activity must not be in the future.
Test (Xpath): activity-date[@type='4']/@iso-date and activity-date[@type='4']/@iso-date castable as xs:date and xs:date(activity-date[@type='4']/@iso-date) gt xs:date($now)

Message: The transaction date must not be in the future.
Test (Xpath): transaction-date/@iso-date and transaction-date/@iso-date castable as xs:date and xs:date(transaction-date/@iso-date) gt xs:date($now)

Message: The transaction value date must not be in the future.
Test (Xpath): value/@value-date and value/@value-date castable as xs:date and xs:date(value/@value-date) gt xs:date($now)

Message: The budget line value date is not in the budget period.
Test (Xpath): budget-line/value/@value-date and budget-line/value/@value-date castable as xs:date and period-start/@iso-date and period-start/@iso-date castable as xs:date and period-end/@iso-date and period-end/@iso-date castable as xs:date and xs:date(budget-line/value/@value-date) lt xs:date(period-start/@iso-date) or xs:date(budget-line/value/@value-date) gt xs:date(period-end/@iso-date)

Message: The last-updated-datetime of the organisation must not be in the future.
Test (Xpath): @last-updated-datetime and @last-updated-datetime castable as xs:dateTime and xs:dateTime(@last-updated-datetime) gt $now

Message: The percentage must be between 0.0 and 100.0 (inclusive).
